data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I2RCNR0_glsQ7kNvgGzFtDH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDx0H23l5avN8mT2UVxDN1o1mf83fm2hXnt7kDvazz36Q&oe=66D06F8C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5NrZRP_lEgUQ7kNvgHus4hp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDIR5jRzjDa8KYuBJAF-Qxoy-sK2PNFSbqarBfTIgg3ww&oe=66D06D9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vQrp7rlWmnEQ7kNvgG-axT7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDE9mzxwiJFw9_AsZJfIHVeslfva89nLm0rxnWC0HPDBg&oe=66D052F1)
